items.title: The Campaign Behind Trump’s Nigeria Strikes
items.description: A yearslong effort to convince the Trump administration that Christians are persecuted in the West African nation has shifted U.S. policy.

items.title: Laura Fernández Wins Costa Rican Presidency
items.description: Laura Fernández’s victory was driven by a crisis in which Costa Rica’s reputation for peace has been tarred by record-breaking violence.
